Welcome to the Rheophysics of Soft Matter group at UCAS International Soft Matter Center and Wenzhou Institute!

What’s New

  • 2023.6 [高分子科学前沿] 国科温研院濑户亮平团队《自然·通讯》：含有杂质的凝胶化过程–加速or延缓？
  • 2023.5 - Our paper about colloidal gelation with non-sticky particles is out in Nature Communications. Y. Jiang, R. Seto, Competing Lengthscales in Colloidal Gelation with Non-Sticky Particles Editors’ Highlights
  • 2022.10 - Our odd viscosity paper is out now on Frontiers in Physics(open access).
    Z. Zhao, M. Yang, S. Komura, R. Seto, Odd Viscosity in Chiral Passive Suspensions, Front. Phys., 2022.
  • 2022.3 - Review paper published in Annual Review of Condensed Matter Physics:
    C. Ness, R. Seto, R. Mari, The physics of dense suspensions, Annu. Rev. Condens. Matter Phys., 13(1):97–117.
  • 2022.1 Dynamic Zero-COVID Strategy in China, Kagaku (Iwanami Shoten, Publishers)
  • 2021.12 New paper with Zhiyuan (open access)
  • 2021.12 NSFC-RFIS grant
  • 2021.9 New paper with Giulio: G. G. Giusteri, R. Seto, Shear jamming and fragility of suspensions in a continuum model with elastic constraints, Phys. Rev. Lett., 127:138001, 2021.
  • 2021.5 BCAM visiting fellow for May–June 2021.

Wenzhou Institute, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (国科温州研究院)

Rheophysics of Soft Matter group

  • Rheophysics of Soft Matter group
  • seto@ucas.ac.cn

    Our group studies soft matter physics. We study rheology and flow of soft materials by simulation and experiment.
